summary: An Ordinance approving and accepting the offer made by Carter, MacDonald & Miller, Inc, for the street railway right-of-way extending through lots thirteen (13), fourteen (14), fifteen (15), sixteen (16) and seventeen (17), block forty-four (44), Denny- Fuhrman Addition, pursuant to call for bids under authority of Resolution No. 6542, and directing the Mayor and City Comptroller to convey said property by proper deed.
